reviewText: Works great and it's a good movie.

May I say that I am loving 6teen on DVD!  No commercials, no "sliced-in-half" like you get on Youtube.  For some reason, it even let me skip over the annoying theme song and end credits, right up until the very end.

I am a fan of 6teen, and I only wish that there were more 6teen DVDs available at reasonable prices here.
